title: 95/496/EC, Euratom: Council Decision of 20 November 1995 appointing a member of the Economic and Social Committee
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 20 November 1995 appointing a member of  the Economic and Social Committee (95/496/EC, Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN  UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 195  thereof,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular  Article 167 thereof,
Having regard to the Council Decision of 26 September 1994 appointing the members of the Economic  and Social Committee for the period ending on 20 September 1998  (1),
Whereas a seat has become vacant on the Economic and Social Committee following the resignation of  Mr Roger Seguy, notified to the Council on 17 February 1995;
Having regard to the nominations submitted by the French Government on 18 October 1995,
Having obtained the opinion of the Commission of the European Communities,
main_body: Mr Henri Malosse is hereby appointed member of the Economic and  Social Committee in place of Mr Roger Seguy for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which  runs until 20 September 1998.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 November 1995.
For the Council The President C. ALBORCH BATALLER
